Игра полна токсиков и придурков, которые ни за что не упустят шанс посмеяться над проигравшим. Из-за этого пропадает желание заходить в эту игру, потому что в каждом лобби куда ты зайдёшь будут люди, которые будут смеяться над тобой и тыкать тебе в лицо тем какое ты конченое нубло. Обычно, это касается выживших, но и среди убийц могут попасться такие.
Al final del dia el juego te califica de manera individual, lo que hace que te afecte menos o nada el hecho de que los random sean malisimos

Bellissimo sono drogato di sto gioco!!!

I have to seemingly change my review. I reviewed the game as negative as I had become extremely burnt out, especially since the devs never seemed to listen and when they did it was too little too late (such as making us wait years to try and change spirit and DS functioning as it did for sooo long). The devs used to do roadmaps and update us but stopped because idk people were too mean to a company on twitter I guess. However extremely recently the devs have started communicating with us and making decent changes and shake ups to the game fairly regularly. They significantly reduced the grind and have even tried to rebalance the game for killers as a whole. There is still a ton of problems, they still take slightly too long, and they're probably only doing this now because their game was going to die (don't believe me look at old steam charts lmao). BUTTTT this is the first time I have ever felt hopeful about this games future. I love this game, it's why I have so many hours. But the devs just made me grow to hate this game. I really wonder if an internal shake up happened because it almost seems like a completely different company. We went from no events, no communication, and devs pushing out updates the community was actively against. To listening and changing, very clear consistent communication, and many awesome new events. Not to mention there's barely a peep from all the devs who have famously said very negative things (cough cough Almo and others). Latest dev stream they didn't even make fun of their playerbase which might be a first. So for the first time I am hopeful and could honestly tell my friend to get the game without reciting an essay on how the game can be really fun but the devs refuse to change the things that makes gameplay abysmal. Wish I could leave a neutral rn tbh but I am more definitely more cautiously optimistic then I've ever been about this game.

I'm giving this game a bad rating because this game been out for 5 years now and they manage to not fix some very big issues in the game that has only 1 mode and it's Rank. If a killer d/c when everyone is connected into the game where you can start walking around, everyone loses a rank point, their offering, and their add on and items. If you on the survivor team and one or 2 of your team mates left/d.c from the start, they give you no reward or any compensation, so expect you and the killers to lose points cause it's going be impossible to win anything. Unless your killer under stand and try to get everyone points, if not everyone loses. How is this game out for 5 years with only 1 mode and it's rank and haven't fix this big issue with people d/c that literally screw everyone else over. Last complaint is why do all killer share the same rank. This game doesn't cater to new players cause if you don't have some of the meta perks it's hard to climb to rank 1. I've gotten rank 3 the highest back when I first started, using Huntress and only her perks and the ones that anyone can get. There's a lot of flaws in the game but I still say it's fun but it'll get you frustrated if you trying to get to rank 1 as survivor.

The game has changed so much and so many times over the years, but it's always getting better 'over all'. For a game with active development for so much time it's pretty impressive that they haven't messed up badly enough to actually ruin it. (Everyone hates some changes sometimes, but I think it'd be nuts to say it isn't trending upwards as a whole)

꿀잼

I have reached rank 1 survivor and rank 1 killer. After extensive gameplay from both sides, and plenty of time reviewing other player's gameplay and the use of mechanics, this game is extremely survivor sided. I suggest never buying this game, unless you want an easy time winning as survivor, or a horrible time spent running around in circles over and over again as killer, never able to kill the survivor, because they run the same speed as you when turning corners and hitting a vault.
Este juego te pone cachonco

After having this game for ages, I must so that I do not support it. 

1. Animations are not only inconsistent, some look passable while others I could make with no prior practice. But a majority of them are genuinely terrible. Which takes out many of the horror elements of the game when you can't even take it seriously.

2. DLC would be fairly priced if the game was easier to get currency for. 200 hours and I've had enough in-game currency to buy maybe 3 DLC characters. This wouldn't matter if the DLC didn't effect gameplay, but many of the good perks are from the DLC characters. You can get access to these perks through a weekly rotation, but they also cost in-game currency which is difficult to get.

3. Gameplay is extremely repetitive, and the ranking system is garbage. When I play killer I never have a challenge. But when I play survivor I always get put with teammates who don't work with each other, and a killer that plays like their life depends on it

TL/DR

gameplay is boring, animations are bad, DLC functions poorly.
